sentences.sContent: His skin was dry and hot, his breathing rapid and jerky.
sentences.sCn: 他的皮肤又干又热，呼吸急促不匀。

sentences.sContent: The bus came to a jerky halt.
sentences.sCn: 公共汽车颠簸着停了下来。

words.tran: 肌肉抽搐；性情古怪的人；蠢人；急拉
小型单缸柱塞泵；海关检查员；肌肉抽搐

trans.tranCn: 抽筋的；急动的；不平稳的
trans.tranOther: jerky movements are rough, with many starts and stops
meat that has been cut into thin pieces and dried in the sun or with smoke
